alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Ottawa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 7:30PM CDT until June 21 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Dickinson County in central Kansas... Southeastern Ottawa County in north central Kansas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 729 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wells to near Niles to 5 miles southwest of Carlton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abilene, Solomon, Wells, Manchester, Carlton, Niles and Talmage. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 276. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
